content: सन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [सद्-क्त] {@--1@} Sitting down, settling down, lying. {@--2@} Dejected, sunk down, downcast. {@--3@} Drooping, relaxed; <ls>Ku. 3. 51.</ls> {@--4@} Weak, low, feeble. {@--5@} Wasted away, decayed. {@--6@} Perished, destroyed. {@--7@} Still, motionless. {@--8@} Shrunk. {@--9@} Adjacent, near. {@--10@} Gone, departed. {@--11@} Sunk, low (in tone &c). --न्नः The tree called पियाल. --न्नं A little, a small quantity.
